titleStmt.title: Golden remains of Sir George Freman, Knight of the Honourable Order of the Bath being choice discourses on select subjects.
titleStmt.author: Freeman, George, Sir.
Freeman, Sarah, Lady.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.M., and are to be sold by Henry Bonwicke ...,

notesStmt.note: Added t.p. on p. [57]: Physiologia, or, The nature of externals briefly discuss't ... 1681.
This work appears as Wing F2132 at reel 693:5 (number cancelled) and as Wing F2167B at reel 1653:20.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
